name: TimeCode
description:
This is a small puzzle-platformer game made for Ludum # 47 by me and my wife.

Please rate this game

In the game, you are a robot who stuck in the time loop. There is a short time given to escape each level through a time portal. Each time you failed time repeats, but somehow the environment is not affected by this time loop, so you can use it for your needs. Struggle through all levels to escape from this hell and find out who put you there.

Credits:  
I did all programming and SFX. Also worked a bit with art.  
My wife did the level design and music.  

We used tileset by 0x72 and Kenney's fonts, which are free and licensed CC0.
